memberdef.name: Ht_IBEX_TIME_HELP
memberdef.initializer:
"
\ Parse-able IBEX time formats:
\n\ relative: +|- integer [us|ms|s|m|h|d|y]
\ +|- float [us|ms|s|m|h|d|y]
\ +|- integer [(s)i(dereal)|(sy)n(odic)] (lunar months)
\n\ UNIX clock: secs
\ GPS seconds: secs.[usecs]
\ GPS time: weeks#secs[.usecs]
\ (# == any non-space)
\ PASS time: [19]990613_054700[.000000]
\ DATE string: [Thu] Jun 13 05:47:00[.000000] UTC 1996
\ (GMT may replace UTC) or the variant
\ [Thu] 13 Jun 1996 05:47:00 AM UTC
\ GRB time: YYMMDD+SOD (UTC)
\ YDS time: YYYY/DOY/SOD (UTC)
\ YY/DOY/SOD (UTC)
\ PLAN time: YYYY/DOY.HHMMSS
\ FILE time: YYYY_DOY_HHMM
\ or YYYY_DOY_HH_MM
\ MAESTRO time: YYYY/MM:DD:HH:MM:SS
\ or [[YY]YY:]DOY:HH:MM:SS
\ or [[YY]YY.]DOY.HH.MM.SS
\ SVN time: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS[.uuuuuu][Z]
\ ISO time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.uuuuuu][Z]
\ MPS time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.mmm][Z]
\ PIGMI time: YYYYMMDDHHMMSSmmm
\ VLBI vex: [YY]YYyDOYdHHhMMmSS.ffffs
\ VLBI s/e: EE@ssssssss.ffff (EE<64)
\n\ time_code: (epoch time[2] time[1] time[0]:)
\ 0x0030 [0xXXXX [0xXXXX [0xXXXX]]] (w/epoch)
\ 0xXXXX [0xXXXX [0xXXXX]] (no epoch)
\n\ Julian day: days.[fday] (both of these are restricted to
\ Modified JD: days.[fday] the epoch 50000 < MJD < 70000)
\n\ HOPS rootcode: unix clock base 26
\n"
